actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to establish a temporary maximum limit on the number of individuals employed in the Federal civil service.

summary.text: Limits the number of individuals in the civil service employed by the United States to the number so employed on January 1, 1977.

titles.title: A bill to establish a temporary maximum limit on the number of individuals employed in the Federal civil service.
